CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper May 11, 1946, pg. 17, reads: "Young Thespians - The Young Citizens' Dramatic Group will present 'The Proposal Dress,' a costume play at A. Leo Weil School, on Tuesday, May 14. The affair is sponsored by the Pollyanna Club of the Bon Ami Temple of Elks. It is directed by Mrs. Alma Tomberlin. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Members of The Young Citizens' Dramatic Group, including four young men wearing top hats and tuxedos, and four young women wearing off the shoulder gingham dresses, posed in open field possibly for production of "The Proposal Dress"
